text: Brent Scowcroft (March 19, 1925 - August 6, 2020) was a United States Air Force Lieutenant General. He was the United States National Security Advisor under U.S. Presidents Gerald Ford and George H. W. Bush. Scowcroft was born on March 19, 1925 in Ogden, Utah. He studied at Columbia University. Scowcroft married to Marian Horner in 1951. They had one daughter. Scowcroft died on August 6, 2020 at his home in Falls Church, Virginia at the age of 95. ==References== ==Other websites== * *"Don't Attack Saddam" by Brent Scowcroft. *Brent Scowcroft speech to Harvard Kennedy School, October 29, 2008 . *Brent Scowcroft résumé . *Oral History of Brent Scowcroft at The West Point Center for Oral History .
